title: Google\Cloud\OsConfig\V1\CreateOSPolicyAssignmentRequest
name: CreateOSPolicyAssignmentRequest
description:
A request message to create an OS policy assignment

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.osconfig.v1.CreateOSPolicyAssignmentRequest

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data

params.name: data.parent

params.name: data.os_policy_assignment
params.description: Required. The OS policy assignment to be created.

params.name: data.os_policy_assignment_id
params.description: Required. The logical name of the OS policy assignment in the project with the following restrictions: Must contain only lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens. Must start with a letter. Must be between 1-63 characters. Must end with a number or a letter. * Must be unique within the project.
